resources.string: Welcome to OpenMPD. We\'re here to help decode your financial partnership. The first step is to add your organisation\'s account(s) to import your donor and donation data. Tap \"Add\" to add an account.
You can set up multiple accounts. Press \"Add\" to add another, or \"Done\" when you\'re done. You can add more accounts later from the \"Settings\" panel on the left menu.
We\'re importing your partner data now. This can take two or three minutes; pull down your device\'s notification drawer to see the progress. Once we\'re done, we\'ll notify you.

Click on the header of any card in a stack to bring it forward. Hit the ? icon in the top right for more info about any screen.
You can swipe away notification cards when you\'re done with them, or leave them as a reminder to follow-up with a partner.

This screen shows a summary of your recent donation activity.

The bar graph gives a month-by-month summary, where blue is monthly gifts, red is special (one-time or occasional) gifts, and orange is regular non-monthly gifts (quarterly, anual, etc.) Light yellow indicates gifts from frequent, but irregular, donors.

The Monthly Averages are calculated over the last year, and "stable monthly" and "stable regular" giving count only current partners (they exclude late and lapsed partners).

You can click notifications to show details about the donor they're related to, and swipe them away when you don't need them anymore.

This list contains all contacts who have ever given to your staff account(s). Givings for regular donors are coloured as follows:

Blue: Current
Green: New partner
Yellow: Late (1-6 months)
Red: Lapsed (more than 6 months late)
Grey: Dropped (more than 12 months late)

You can search for contacts by name with the search icon, or filter by giving status with the group icon.

This page gives detailed information on an individual contact. If a contact has made a gift in the last year, a summary graph of recent gifts is shown.\n\nYou can add comments to a contact\'s record, or view their total giving history, by pressing the menu button.

This page allows you to manage (add, delete, or edit) accounts to download your donor data online.\n\nYour organisation should be able to provide you with the login details you need (this is the same username and password you use to download donor data in TntMPD).
